text.en: Emaho! Upon the scintillating pistils of an eight-petaled lotus
text.en-trans: emaho, nying ü depé chukyé dab gyé ru zhepé

text.en: In full bloom at the center of my faithful heart,
text.en-trans: gesar nampar trawa ö nga yi long du

text.en: You sit, Great Tertön, guru of threefold kindness, in a sphere of five-colored light.
text.en-trans: kadrin sumden terchen lama dé zhuk yö

text.en: I pray to you with fervent, piercing devotion!
text.en-trans: mögü dungwa drakpö solwa rang deb so

text.en: Throw open the glorious door of your wondrous wisdom and love,
text.en-trans: mejung khyentsé pal gyi gopar dé ché né

text.en: And bless my three doors as deity, mantra, and dharmakāya!
text.en-trans: go sum lha ngak chökur jin gyi rang lob shik

text.en: The consummate, utmost profundity of the Lord of Uḍḍiyāna’s wisdom mind
text.en-trans: shintu zabpé tartuk orgyen jé tukkyé

text.en: Is the four fierce Acala classes who overpower the four demons.
text.en-trans: dü zhi zilnön tum chen rik zhi yi nak tsen

text.en: Blue Acala is the slayer of the demon of distraction, the son of the gods.
text.en-trans: namyeng lha bu dü chom miyowa ting gé

text.en: Upon us teachers and disciples, trained in the two stages of Acala,
text.en-trans: rim nyi lam la gompé naljor gyi pönlob

text.en: And striving in the main practice, the yoga of fierce heat,
text.en-trans: lam gyi ngözhi tummö naljor la tsönpé

text.en: Bestow, we pray, the siddhi that rouses the wisdom of blissful warmth!
text.en-trans: dé drö yeshe charwé ngödrub zhik zhu o
